page.topic: Specifying the Font of the List Box
page.description: The owner-draw string allows you to define the font of text that it outputs.

section.description: For example, in the previous example, by changing the owner-draw string to this:
we are able to display the list box in Times New Roman, 14 point. The complete script is:
section.example: dim filelist[100] as C data = <<%dlg% customer.dbf invoice_header.dbf invoice_items.dbf products.dbf invoices.set %dlg% data = stritran(data,".dbf",".1") data = stritran(data,".set",".2") filelist.initialize(data) filelist.sort() result = ui_dlg_box("Select Table/Set",<<%dlg% {region} [%I=$a5_table,$a5_set;O={F=times new roman,14}{I=@$(.)+1} {@1,$(.)-1}%.35,10filename^#filelist]| {endregion}; <10OK> <10Cancel> %dlg%)
